SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT601
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message type is exchanged by or on behalf of the institutions or corporates, party A and party B, which have agreed to a Commodity option contract. This message is also used when one of the parties is a fund manager.
It is used to confirm the details of
a) a new contract between the parties
b) an amendment to a previously agreed contract
c) the cancellation of a contract
d) the surrender of an option by the buyer (holder) to the seller (grantor) for compensation.
In some cases, only one of the financial institutions involved in a contract will send a confirmation to the second financial institution. These cases include:
a) retransmission due to errors in a previously sent confirmation
b) additional information about a previously confirmed contract. It may also be used to report the details of a contract to a trade repository.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
One of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36)

Code.Name: AGNT
Code.Description: Sender/Receiver is sending/receiving the message on behalf of a third party.

Code.Name: BILA
Code.Description: Bilateral confirmation, ie, the Sender and the Receiver are the principals.

Code.Name: BROK
Code.Description: The confirmation is sent by a money broker.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code)(Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78).

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: ACCT
Code.Description: followed by the account number

Code.Name: ADD1
Code.Description: followed by the first line of the address

Code.Name: ADD2
Code.Description: followed by the second line of the address

Code.Name: CITY
Code.Description: followed by the city (and state, country)

Code.Name: CLRC
Code.Description: followed by a clearing code

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: followed by UK domestic sort code

Code.Name: LEIC
Code.Description: Legal Entity Identifier

Code.Name: NAME
Code.Description: followed by the name

Code.Name: USCH
Code.Description: followed by CHIPS UID

Code.Name: USFW
Code.Description: followed by FedWire Routing Number

Validation.Comment: Buy/Sell Indicator must contain one of the following codes: (This is not a NVR)

Code.Name: BUY
Code.Description: The Sender is confirming an option bought

Code.Name: SELL
Code.Description: The Sender is confirming an option sold

Validation.Comment: Call/Put Indicator must contain one of the following codes: (This is not a NVR)

Code.Name: CALL
Code.Description: The Sender is confirming a call option

Code.Name: PUT
Code.Description: The Sender is confirming a put option

Validation.Comment: Style Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T09):

Code.Name: A
Code.Description: This is an American style option

Code.Name: B
Code.Description: This is a Bermudan style option

Code.Name: E
Code.Description: This is a European style option

Code.Name: V
Code.Description: This is an Asian style option

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Allocation must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T03) :

Code.Name: ALLOC
Code.Description: Specifies the commodity is allocated

Code.Name: UNALL
Code.Description: Specifies the commodity is unallocated

Validation.Comment: Delivery Details must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T35):
Type identifies the commodity or coin. When identifying a commodity, one of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T04) :
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMM (Error code(s): T38) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Type must be one of the following codes (Error code(s): T60):

Code.Name: NETCASH
Code.Description: Cash-settled options result in two commodities spot transactions where the commodity nets to zero and the net amount is paid cash.

Code.Name: PHYSICAL
Code.Description: Physically-settled options result in one commodity spot transaction where one party delivers the commodity and the other party pays cash

SwiftFieldDef.Description: Unit and Amount of the Commodity

Option.Name: F
Option.Description: Unit and Amount of the Commodity

Validation.Comment: Unit must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T06) :
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03,T40,T43) .
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Identifier Code must not be a BEI. Please refer to the latest version of the BIC Directory - Corporations for more information about BEIs. This error code applies to all types of BICs referenced in a FIN message including SWIFT BICs, non-SWIFT BICs, Masters, Synonyms, Live destinations and Test & Training destinations . (Error code(s): C05) .

Identifier Code must not be a BEI. Please refer to the latest version of the BIC Directory - Corporations for more information about BEIs. This error code applies to all types of BICs referenced in a FIN message including SWIFT BICs, non-SWIFT BICs, Masters, Synonyms, Live destinations and Test & Training destinations . (Error code(s): C05) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Identifier Code must not be a BEI. Please refer to the latest version of the BIC Directory - Corporations for more information about BEIs. This error code applies to all types of BICs referenced in a FIN message including SWIFT BICs, non-SWIFT BICs, Masters, Synonyms, Live destinations and Test & Training destinations . (Error code(s): C05) .

Option.Name: H
Option.Description: Type, Date, Version of the Agreement

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Version must be a valid year expressed YYYY. It must not consist entirely of zeros.(Error code(s): T50)
Type must be specified using one of the following codes (Error code(s): T47).

Code.Name: ISDA
Code.Description: ISDA Master Agreement

Code.Name: OTHER
Code.Description: Another type of bilateral agreement signed up front between party A and party B. The agreement must be specified in field 77D.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code)(Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78):

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: CLRC
Code.Description: followed by a clearing code

Code.Name: LEIC
Code.Description: Legal Entity Identifier

Code.Name: NAME
Code.Description: followed by the name

Code.Name: NAME
Code.Description: followed by the name

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45).
One of the following codes must be used in Side Indicator (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: C
Code.Description: The clearing broker identification is for the client leg.

Code.Name: P
Code.Description: The clearing broker identification is for the Central Counterparty (CCP) leg.

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The contract is below the clearing threshold

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The contract is above the clearing threshold

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T67):

Code.Name: A
Code.Description: Post-allocation

Code.Name: P
Code.Description: Pre-allocation

Code.Name: U
Code.Description: Unallocated

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T67):

Code.Name: F
Code.Description: Fully collateralised

Code.Name: O
Code.Description: One-way collateralised

Code.Name: P
Code.Description: Partially collateralised

Code.Name: U
Code.Description: Uncollateralised

Validation.Comment: UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39).
Sign ([N]) must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
The following code must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The transaction is non-standard.

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 Field 53a may only be present if field 34P is used (Error code(s): C20).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 53a may only be present if field 34P is used."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 Field 31C may only be present in the case of an American style option (ie, subfield 3 of field 23 contains 'A') (Error code(s): C79).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 31C may only be present in the case of an American style option (ie, subfield 3 of field 23 contains 'A')"

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: C3 The currency in the amount fields 32B and 34a must be the same (Error code(s): C02).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The currency in the amount fields 32B and 34a must be the same."

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In Sequence A , if subfield 1 of field 77H is OTHER then field 77D in Sequence A is mandatory else it is optional(Error code(s): D36)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence A , if subfield 1 of field 77H is OTHER then field 77D in Sequence A is mandatory else it is optional"

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 When GOLD is defined in subfield 4 (Type) of field 26C, then the Unit in field 32F must not be GOZ nor TOZ (Error code(s): D07).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When GOLD is defined in subfield 4 (Type) of field 26C, then the Unit in field 32F must not be GOZ nor TOZ."

fieldvalidation.name: C6
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence B, field 15B may not be the only field, that is, if field 15B is present, then at least one of the other fields of sequence B must be present (Error code(s): C98)."

fieldvalidation.name: F-22
fieldvalidation.comment: F-22 Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code . These codes must appear in alphabetical order, with letters taking precedence over numbers (Error code(s): T96).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code . These codes must appear in alphabetical order, with letters taking precedence over numbers"

fieldvalidation.name: F-23
fieldvalidation.comment: F-23 The codes are separated by four digits, which must consist of the rightmost non-zero digits of the strike price specified in field 32B , preceded by the three digits to the left of it. If there are no digits to the left of it, the space must be zero-filled (Error code(s): T22).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The codes are separated by four digits, which must consist of the rightmost non-zero digits of the strike price specified in field 32B , preceded by the three digits to the left of it. If there are no digits to the left of it, the space must be zero-filled."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A1
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A1 When Type is AMEG, Denomination must be one of the following: 50, 25, 10, 5.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is AMEG, Denomination must be one of the following: 50, 25, 10, 5."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A2
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A2 When Type is ANUG, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is ANUG, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A3
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A3 When Type is BRIT, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is BRIT, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A4
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A4 When Type is CORO, Denomination must be one of the following: 100, 20, 10.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is CORO, Denomination must be one of the following: 100, 20, 10."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A5
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A5 When Type is DUCA, Denomination must be one of the following: 4, 1.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is DUCA, Denomination must be one of the following: 4, 1."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A6
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A6 When Type is FRFR, Denomination must be one of the following: 20.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is FRFR, Denomination must be one of the following: 20."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A7
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A7 When Type is GECU, Denomination must be one of the following: 50.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is GECU, Denomination must be one of the following: 50."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A8
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A8 When Type is KRUG, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is KRUG, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A9
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A9 When Type is LBTY, Denomination must be one of the following: 20, 10, 5.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is LBTY, Denomination must be one of the following: 20, 10, 5."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A10
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A10 When Type is MAPL, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is MAPL, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A11
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A11 When Type is MEXP, Denomination must be one of the following: 50, 20, 10, 5.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is MEXP, Denomination must be one of the following: 50, 20, 10, 5."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A12
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A12 When Type is NOBL, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is NOBL, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A13
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A13 When Type is NSOV, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is NSOV, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A14
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A14 When Type is OSOV, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is OSOV, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A15
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A15 When Type is SAEG, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is SAEG, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A16
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A16 When Type is SECU, Denomination must be one of the following: 5.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is SECU, Denomination must be one of the following: 5."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A17
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A17 When Type is STAT, Denomination must be one of the following: 20, 10, 5.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is STAT, Denomination must be one of the following: 20, 10, 5."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A18
fieldvalidation.comment: F-26C-A18 When Type is VREN, Denomination must be one of the following: 20, 10.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is VREN, Denomination must be one of the following: 20, 10."

fieldvalidation.name: F-26C-A19
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is NBUF , Denomination must be one of the following: 50."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is NBUF , Denomination must be one of the following: 50."

fieldvalidation.name: F-32F
fieldvalidation.comment: F-32F Amount must not contain more than six digits following the decimal comma (Error code(s): C89).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Amount must not contain more than six digits following the decimal comma"

fieldvalidation.name: F-33B
fieldvalidation.comment: F-33B If not PCT, Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If not PCT, Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code"

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: F-22-C
fieldvalidation.comment: F-22-C Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code(Error code(s): T95).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-77A-ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."
